title: More new handwriting
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Diane O'Connor and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Three related programs by Barbara Nichol on the teaching of the new handwriting style for Victorian government schools. 1.”The New handwriting”. Provides an introduction to the new handwriting course for all members of the school community. 2.”Learning handwriting”. Highlights the reasons for implementing the course. 3.”Victorian modern cursive”. Provides a demostration of the course.
